tool_description: Grab and convert cryptocurrency prices to any cryptocurrency or fiat currency.
name: Crypto Price
title: Crypto Price

api_list.name: Information
api_list.description: Get information on the last time our API pulled the latest prices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com/info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Price
api_list.description: Allows users to pull price information for an individual cryptocurrency.
